attributes.action: Award a knighthood to John Smeaton in recognition of his heroism and courage in  confronting the terrorists at Glasgow Airport so successfully
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When John Smeaton saw what appeared to be a terrorist atrocity taking place before him on Saturday 30th June 2007 at Glasgow Airport he acted as we would all like to, if only we had his courage.

He moved  in to support the police and to protect his fellow man. Without any consideration for his own safety he got 'stuck in' and ensured the dentention of the suspects. 

John is typical of the unsung heroes we have in our society, who act postively to protect our democracy by actions, not words.

For this act of heroism we seek a knighthood for Mr Smeaton.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
